name: Gun Simulator - Gun Games
description:
Gun Simulator - Gun Games is one of the most addictive simulator games with a very particular aim.
The army may depend on you anytime; make yourself brave and ready to get into the action. This time Integer games welcome you to the world’s best weapon simulator with realistic animations and sounds!

Mostly with this kind of shooting games, you can do army firing practices for real guns. This game offers you the realistic and closest experience of both semi-automatic and automatic guns shooting on firing range. We tried involving most of the weapons used in World War I and World War II to contribute towards the victory.

How to play?
You can easily select your favorite guns with single touch. Start using the weapon of your choice by taping on the trigger and use reload option whenever needed.
Huge weapon store awaits you in the game. Which includes AK 47, AK 74U, SMG3, Slugger, 1911_Pistol, M24, M107, QK, M1897, CQ 16, M64 C and many more.

Game Features:
• Tons of real Guns
• Exact Gun Animation
• Realistic sounds for gunshot & reload
• Playable on your phone and tablet
• Awesome firing effects

Get this weapon simulator game from simulator games category, while it’s free, and enjoy playing with various firearms in your comfort zone.
